title: Opinion: Rapha Posted Losses—Are Road and Gravel Cycling Dying?
content:
Digging deeper into Rapha's financials paints a more nuanced picture of the state of the apparel brand — but what do the brand's woes say about the state of cycling?

Read the full article at Opinion: Rapha Posted Losses—Are Road and Gravel Cycling Dying? on Velo.
author: Josh Ross
